values.name: hero
values.comment: - episode - If omitted, returns the hero of the whole saga. If provided, returns the hero of that particular episode.

Chat messages for subscriptions demo

values.name: phrase
values.comment: The phrase that was sent as the message.

values.name: selection
values.comment: Select fields to build up a SelectionSet for this object.

values.name: selection
values.comment:
Select fields to build up a top-level mutation. The request can be sent with
functions from `Graphqelm.Http`.

values.comment: send a message for the realtime subscriptions to see.

name: Swapi.Interface.Character
comment:
Code for retrieving fields from a Character in a type-safe way.
@docs selection, commonSelection, onDroid, onHuman, appearsIn, friends, id, name, avatarUrl

values.name: appearsIn
values.comment: Which movies they appear in.

values.name: avatarUrl
values.comment: Url to a profile picture for the character.

values.name: commonSelection
values.comment: Select only common fields from the interface.

values.name: friends
values.comment: The friends of the character, or an empty list if they have none.
values.type: Graphqelm.SelectionSet.SelectionSet decodesTo Swapi.Interface.Character -> Graphqelm.Field.Field (List decodesTo) Swapi.Interface.Character

values.name: id
values.comment: The ID of the character.

values.name: name
values.comment: The name of the character.

values.name: onDroid
values.comment: Select the fields to use when the type is Droid.

values.name: onHuman
values.comment: Select the fields to use when the type is Human.

values.name: selection
values.comment: Select both common and type-specific fields from the interface.
values.type: (Maybe.Maybe typeSpecific -> a -> constructor) -> List (Graphqelm.SelectionSet.FragmentSelectionSet typeSpecific Swapi.Interface.Character) -> Graphqelm.SelectionSet.SelectionSet (a -> constructor) Swapi.Interface.Character

values.comment: Select the fields to use when the type is Human.

name: Swapi.Enum.Phrase
comment:
Phrases for chat subscriptions demo.
@docs Phrase, decoder, toString

types.name: Phrase
types.comment:
Phrases for StarChat

  - BadFeeling - Originally said by Han Solo
  - Droids - Originally said by Obi-Wan
  - Faith - Originally said by Vader.
  - Father - Originally said by Vader.
  - Help - Originally said by Leia.
  - TheForce - Originally said by Obi-Wan.
  - Traitor - Originally said by Vader
  - Trap - Originally said by Admiral Ackbar
  - Try - Originally said by Yoda.

values.name: decoder
values.comment: decoder

values.name: toString
values.comment: Convert from the union type representating the Enum to a string that the GraphQL server will recognize.

name: Swapi.Union
Swapi.Scalar
Swapi.Object
Swapi.Enum.Language
comment:
Enum for languages for greetings.
@docs Language, decoder, toString

types.name: Language
types.comment:
- En - English
  - Es - Spanish
  - No - Norwegian

values.name: decoder
values.comment: Decode a string from the GraphQL server into the Language union.

values.name: toString
values.comment: Convert from the union type representating the Enum to a string that the GraphQL server will recognize.

name: Swapi.Interface
Swapi.Enum.Episode
comment:
Enum for all episodes that the API has in its system.
@docs Episode, decoder, toString

types.name: Episode
types.comment:
One of the films in the Star Wars Trilogy

  - Empire - Released in 1980.
  - Jedi - Released in 1983.
  - Newhope - Released in 1977.

values.name: decoder
values.comment: Decode an Episode from the GraphQL endpoint.

values.name: toString
values.comment: Convert from the union type representating the Enum to a string that the GraphQL server will recognize.
